title: Add mp3 files to 'My Sounds'
content: I am trying to move some MP3 files from the downloads file into 'My Sounds' so that I can use them as ringtones. When I click on the 3 dots in the upper right hand corner,  I do not get the option to move them anywhere, and there is no option to copy them to my ringtones folder. I have tried researching various methods. but have not been able to find anything that actually works. Hope someone can help. Thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
